English: Great Leap Forward (1958-1960), Mao's attempt to modernize China's economy, which resulted in economic devastation, and millions of deaths from famine caused by misguided policies

d.f: `西元~`一~`九五~`八~`年~`起~`中國大陸~`依~`毛~`澤~`東指~`示~，`在~`工業~、`農業~`各~`方面~`力圖~`飛躍~`發展~。`由於~`政策~`錯誤~，`使~`大陸~`工~、`農產~`業~`受~`到~`極~`大~`傷害~。

English: Great Leap Forward (1958-1960), Mao's attempt to modernize China's economy, which resulted in economic devastation, and millions of deaths from famine caused by misguided policies
